title: Finding the Inverse Matrix
text: We must find the inverse of the coefficient matrix $$\begin{bmatrix} 3 & -2 \\ -1 & 5 \end{bmatrix}$$, which is $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{5}{13} & \frac{2}{13} \\ \frac{1}{13} & \frac{2}{13} \end{bmatrix}$$
speech: We must find the inverse of the coefficient matrix  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 3, negative 2 row 2 negative 1, 5 , which is  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 5 over 13 2 over 13 row 2 1 over 13 2 over 13
pacedSpeech: We must find the inverse of the coefficient matrix   the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 3, negative 2 row 2 negative 1, 5
, which is   the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 5 over 13 2 over 13 row 2 1 over 13 2 over 13

title: Multiplying the constant matrix and the coefficient matrix.
text: Now, we must multiply $$\begin{bmatrix} 6 \\ -2 \end{bmatrix}$$ by $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{5}{13} & \frac{2}{13} \\ \frac{1}{13} & \frac{2}{13} \end{bmatrix}$$ to get $$\begin{bmatrix} 2 \\ 0 \end{bmatrix}$$. $$(2,0)$$ is our answer.
speech: Now, we must multiply  the 2 by 1 column matrix 6 negative 2  by  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 5 over 13 2 over 13 row 2 1 over 13 2 over 13  to get , the 2 by 1 column matrix 2 0 . , parentheses 2 comma 0,   is our answer.
